UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of the antibacterial peptide PMAP-36 and its analogues.
Literature.Author: Zhou J, Liu Y, Shen T, Chen L, Zhang C, Cai K, Liao C, Wang C

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=128 µg/ml,Mouse erythrocytes:27% Hemolysis=512 µg/ml,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:24% Killing=512 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=0.025µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis LY8(MIC=50µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes CICC 21533(MIC=125µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis CICC 24434(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis C78-1(MIC=3.125µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium SL1344(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Avibacterium avium C48-3(MIC=25µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Escherichia coli K88(MIC=50µg/ml)
